definitions.explanation_en: A proper noun, typically used as a surname, referring to individuals or families bearing the name Farley. It has no inherent generic meaning and is not used as a common noun in standard English.
definitions.explanation_cn: 专有名词，通常用作姓氏，指代姓法尔利的个人或家族。在标准英语中无通用含义，不作为普通名词使用。
definitions.example_en: Farley was the lead actor in the critically acclaimed film.
definitions.example_cn: 法尔利是这部广受好评电影的男主角。
